title: The Baby-Sitter II
description: He's back. Jenny's last baby-sitting job nearly killed herâ€”for real. But she's a survivor. She's getting over it. The crazy guy who was after her is gone. She's even got a new baby-sitting job. Then the phone rings. When she answers, she hears a familiar voice. A voice from the past... from the grave... "Hi, Babes, I'm back."
author: R.L. Stine
